channel.title: FalkorDB on Zimera Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in FalkorDB on Zimera Corporation

item.title: FalkorDB - RedisGraph Fork for OpenCypher-based Property Graph DBMS
item.description: If you are a software developer, mainly working with data intensive application, chances are, you’ve already work with in-memory data as it will make our app runs fast. Redis usually becomes de-facto DBMS for caching. Redis mainly uses key-value data model but its modular architecture makes it possible to develop other tools or data models using Redis key-value as its underlying data model. That’s also happens with RedisGraph, a Redis module for property graph model.
